service.service_embed: <object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="{w}" height="{h}" data="http://oystatic.ignimgs.com/src/core/swf/IGNPlayer.swf"> <param name="movie" value="http://oystatic.ignimgs.com/src/core/swf/IGNPlayer.swf"> <param name="flashvars" value="url=http://www.ign.com/videos/configs/id/{serviceVAL2}.config"> <param name="allowfullscreen" value="true"> <param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"> <param name="allownetworking" value="all" /> </object>
